headline: Smashburger’s new CEO, Jim Sullivan, plots brand reinvigoration
summary: The former chief development officer of Qdoba and CKE says he’s ‘woken’ the brand

headline: Restaurant promotions to intensify as consumer spending weakens
summary: Investing.com -- A tougher promotional battle is expected among U.S. restaurant chains in the second half of 2025 as consumer spending shows signs of strain. Stifel analysts say larger brands like McDonald’s, Domino’s and Taco Bell better positioned to withstand the pressure.

raw.headline: Restaurant promotions to intensify as consumer spending weakens

headline: What To Do With These Seven S&P 500 Stocks That Slumped
summary: Tech sector gains masked the underperforming stocks in the S&P 500; selective buying and holding is recommended based on company-specific factors. Read the full analysis here.

headline: 1 Unpopular Stock That Deserves Some Love and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: Wall Street has issued downbeat forecasts for the stocks in this article. These predictions are rare - financial institutions typically hesitate to say bad things about a company because it can jeopardize their other revenue-generating business lines like M&A advisory.
